resources.string: The game consists of two teams: the werewolf and his followers, and the villagers (with the jester, who will be explained later). For a team to win, they must kill all the players on the opposing team. Each team has different roles, and each of them has unique abilities that can be used to achieve victory.

The game consists of two phases: night and day. At night, players will use their abilities to attack, survive attacks from the opposing team, gain information, etc. The werewolf team knows who the villagers are and who their teammates are. In contrast, the villagers must figure out who the werewolves are in order to kill them. If the werewolf killed, and it is not the last of his team, a teammate will take his place as the werewolf.

During the day, players will have time (as much as they want, although a timer can be set if desired) to discuss who the werewolves might be (werewolves are encouraged to pretend being villagers), and at the end of the discussion, players can vote for someone to be put on trial. After their defense, the rest of the players will individually vote on whether they want to hang them or not (the player is hanged if the majority votes so. After that, the round ends, night falls, and a new round begins.
There is one role that plays solo: the jester. The jester wins only by getting himself hanged at the end of the round.
The game starts at night, each player is secretly assigned a role and should perform their actions discreetly (without showing their phone screen to the other players)."
Belongs to the werewolves team. Every night can select a villager to kill
Belongs to the werewolves team. Every night can select a villager to cancel his/her ability
Belongs to the werewolves team. Can select a villager to kill at night. Ability has 1 turn cooldown. Ability starts on cooldown
Belongs to the werewolves team. Can select a dead player to revive it as a zombie
Belongs to the werewolves team. Has no ability, but can vote at the end of the round (only appears when revived by necromancer).
Belongs to the werewolves team. At night can spill oil on up to 2 players or ignite. Ignite kills all the players with oil, including the arsonist.
Belongs to the villagers team. Has no ability
Belongs to the villagers team. Can cast a protection barrier on a player at night (from all attacks on that turn). Ability has 1 turn cooldown.
Belongs to the villagers team. Once a game can select a player to revive (werewolves included)
Belongs to the villagers team. Once a game can select a player to shot to kill(villagers included)
Belongs to the villagers team. Once a game can stay alert at night (Every player that visits him, will get shot).
Belongs to the villagers team. Has to lives (dies instantly if hanged).Every night can select a player to protect from all attacks received.

Belongs to the villagers team. At night can hide into a player\'s house. All abilities that target him directly have no effect. Both he and the host receive the abilities targeted to he host. If hi hides in the house of werewolf he is attacked.

Belongs to the villagers team. At night can set the bomb in a player\'s house . When detonator dies, the bomb explodes, striking target player. Detonator may change the bomb to other location. If he dies when setting the bomb, ability has no effect.
Belongs to the villagers team. At night can stalk a player, next round will be revealed to him ONE player that visited or was visited by target player (if there was any).
Belongs to the villagers team. At night can investigate. Next day 3 players will be revealed to him. At least one of them is a werewolf
Belongs to the villagers team. Appears as a werewolf teammate secretly. If a werewolf uses an ability over a teammate, it will have no effect.
Plays alone. Has no ability. His objective is to be hanged at the end of any round.
